subSections.title: Readings
Compounds
Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|じょう|hhira=じやう}}

# a traditional Japanese unit of length, equal to one {{m|ja|丈|tr=jō|pos=roughly three [[meter]]s}} and three {{m|ja|尺|tr=shaku|pos=roughly one [[foot]] or thirty [[centimeter]]s}}

subSections.title: Etymology 3
Adjective
Usage notes
Derived terms
subSections.text:
* {{ja-r|常体|つねたい}}
* {{ja-r|経常|けいつね}}

subSections.title: Etymology 4
Usage notes
subSections.text:
Only used in compounds. Attaches to [[noun]]s and other [[nominal]]s, often (but not always) with the now-obsolete possessive particle {{m|ja|つ|tr=tsu}}.
* {{ja-usex|'''常'''つ[[御%門]]、[[常夏|'''常'''夏]]、'''常'''とわ|'''とこ''' つ み%かど、 '''とこ'''なつ、 '''とこ'''とわ|the '''eternal''' palace, '''eternal''' summer, '''eternal''' permanence [→ eternity]}}

subSections.title: Derived terms
Etymology 5
Adjective
Usage notes
subSections.text: Listed in dictionaries<ref name="KDJ"/><ref name="DJR"/><ref name="DJS">{{R:Daijisen}}</ref> as a {{m|ja|形容動詞|tr=keiyō dōshi||''-na'' adjective}}. However, actual usage suggests that this was only used with particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}} as an [[adverb]], and never with particle {{m|ja|な|tr=na}} or classical {{m|ja|なる|tr=naru}} as an [[adjective]]. When this appears [[attributively]], it is followed by particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no}},<ref name="SMK5"/> the usual construction when using a noun to modify another noun.

subSections.title: Noun
Etymology 6
Usage notes
subSections.text: Listed in some dictionaries<ref name="KDJ"/><ref name="DJR"/><ref name="DJS"/> as a {{m|ja|形容動詞|tr=keiyō dōshi||''-na'' adjective}}; other sources<ref name="SMK5"/> only list this as a {{m|ja|副詞|tr=fukushi||adverb}}. Historical usage suggests that this was only used with particle {{m|ja|に|tr=ni}} as an [[adverb]], and not with particle {{m|ja|な|tr=na}} or classical {{m|ja|なる|tr=naru}} as an [[adjective]]. When this appears [[attributively]], it is followed by particle {{m|ja|の|tr=no}},<ref name="DJR"/><ref name="DJS"/><ref name="SMK5"/> the usual construction when using a noun to modify another noun.
